displayName.japanese: ファーストコンタクト

displayName.french: Chasseur de bug de Rang S
displayName.japanese: Sランク バグキャッチャー

description.brazilian: Colete todos os 223 bugs na sua Lista de Bugs.
description.english: Collect all 223 bugs in your Bug-list
description.french: Ajoutez les 223 bugs à votre Liste.
description.german: Sammle 223 Bugs in deiner Bugliste.
description.italian: Colleziona tutti i 223 bug nella tua Lista dei Bug
description.japanese: バグリストにある223個のバグを全て集める
description.russian: Соберите 223 ошибки в списке ошибок
description.schinese: 在Bug清单上集齐223个Bug
description.tchinese: 在Bug清單上集齊223個Bug

description.brazilian: Veja o sistema quebrar pela primeira vez.
description.english: Witness the system crash for the first time
description.french: Assistez à votre premier crash du système.
description.german: Beobachte erstmals den Systemaussfall.
description.italian: Assisti al crash di sistema per la prima volta
description.japanese: 初めてシステムクラッシュを目撃する
description.russian: Наблюдайте за отказом системы в первый раз
description.schinese: 初次目睹系统崩溃
description.tchinese: 初次目睹系統崩潰

description.brazilian: Obtenha a Açoeterno, a arma da lenda.
description.english: Obtain the Eversteel, weapon of legend
description.french: Obtenez l'Éfernelle, l'arme légendaire.
description.german: Erhalte Eversteel, die legendäre Waffe.
description.italian: Ottieni l'Eternacciao, lama delle leggende
description.japanese: 伝説の武器「エバースティール」を手に入れる
description.russian: Получите Вечный Меч, легендарное оружие
description.schinese: 获得传说中的武器，亘钢神剑
description.tchinese: 獲得傳說中的武器，亙鋼神劍

description.brazilian: Finalize o jogo sem completar os objetivos da Lista de Bugs.
description.english: Finish the game without fulfilling your Bug-List objectives
description.french: Terminez le jeu sans remplir les objectifs de la Liste de Bugs.
description.german: Beende das Spiel ohne die Bugliste zu vervollständigen.
description.italian: Finisci il gioco senza completare gli obbiettivi della tua Lista dei Bug
description.japanese: バグリストの目標を達成せずにゲームをクリアする
description.russian: Завершите игру, не заполняя список ошибок
description.schinese: 在填充Bug清单未达标的情况下通关游戏
description.tchinese: 在填充Bug清單未達標的情況下通關遊戲

displayName.japanese: 買ってくれてありがとう

description.brazilian: Consiga o Final Verdadeiro do jogo depois de escolher deletar a Açoeterno.
description.english: Finish the game's True End after choosing to delete the Eversteel
description.french: Terminez la Vraie Fin du jeu après avoir choisi de supprimer l'Éfernelle.
description.german: Finde das echte Spielende, nachdem du dich gegen Eversteel entschieden hast.
description.italian: Completa il Finale Segreto dopo aver scelto di cancellare l'Eternacciaio
description.japanese: エバースティールの削除を選択し、トゥルーエンドをクリアする
description.russian: Закончите игру с настоящей концовкой, выбрав удаление Вечного Меча
description.schinese: 在真结局中选择删除亘钢神剑
description.tchinese: 在真結局中選擇刪除亙鋼神劍

displayName.japanese: 遊んでくれてありがとう

description.brazilian: Consiga o Final Verdadeiro do jogo depois de escolher empunhar a Açoeterno.
description.english: Finish the game's True End after choosing to wield the Eversteel
description.french: Terminez la Vraie Fin du jeu après avoir choisi d'utiliser l'Éfernelle.
description.german: Finde das echte Spielende, nachdem du dich für Eversteel entschieden hast.
description.italian: Completa il Finale Segreto dopo aver scelto di brandire l'Eternacciaio
description.japanese: エバースティールを使用することを選択し、トゥルーエンドをクリアする
description.russian: Закончите игру с настоящей концовкой, взяв в руки Вечный Меч
description.schinese: 在真结局中选择保留亘钢神剑
description.tchinese: 在真結局中選擇保留亙鋼神劍

description.brazilian: Desbloqueie todos os caminhos na WARP ZONE.
description.english: Unlock all paths in your WARP ZONE
description.french: Débloquez tous les chemins dans votre WARP ZONE.
description.german: Aktiviere alle Zugänge in der WARP ZONE.
description.italian: Sblocca ogni percorso nella tua WARP ZONE
description.japanese: ワープゾーンにある全ての道を解放する
description.russian: Разблокируйте все пути в ВАРП ЗОНЕ
description.schinese: 在跳关区中解锁全部路线
description.tchinese: 在跳關區中解鎖全部路線

description.brazilian: Escreva algo no perfil da rede social do Dev.
description.english: Write something on the Dev's social media profile
description.french: Écrivez quelque chose sur le réseau social du Dév.
description.german: Schreibe etwas auf das Social Media Profil des Entwicklers.
description.italian: Scrivi qualcosa sul profilo social dello Sviluppatore
description.japanese: 開発者のSNSに書き込みをする
description.russian: Напишите что-нибудь в профиле разработчика в соцсети
description.schinese: 在开发者的社交媒体资料页面留言
description.tchinese: 在開發者的社交媒體資料頁面留言

description.brazilian: Obtenha o item 'Flor Indestrutível'.
description.english: Obtain the 'Indestructable flower' item
description.french: Obtenez la 'Fleur Indestructible'.
description.german: Erhalte das Item 'unzerstörbare Blume'.
description.italian: Ottieni l'oggetto 'Fiore indistruttibile'
description.japanese: アイテム「不滅の花」を手に入れる
description.russian: Получите предмет 'Неразрушаемый цветок'
description.schinese: 获得道具“坚不可摧之花”
description.tchinese: 獲得道具“堅不可摧之花”

description.brazilian: Derrote Dana sem usar magias.
description.english: Defeat Dana without using spells
description.french: Battez Dana sans utiliser de sorts.
description.german: Besiege Dana ohne Zauberei.
description.italian: Sconfiggi Dana senza usare incantesimi
description.japanese: 呪文を使わずにダナを倒す
description.russian: Победите Дану не используя магию
description.schinese: 不使用魔法击败击败黛娜
description.tchinese: 不使用魔法擊敗擊敗黛娜

displayName.japanese: バグだらけ、バカじゃない

description.brazilian: Obtenha o item 'Carta de Despedida'.
description.english: Obtain the 'Farewell Letter' item
description.french: Obtenez la 'Lettre d'Adieu'.
description.german: Erhalte das Item 'Abschiedsbrief'.
description.italian: Ottieni l'oggetto 'Lettera d'addio'
description.japanese: アイテム「別れの手紙」を手に入れる
description.russian: Получите предмет 'Прощальное письмо'
description.schinese: 获得道具“告别信”
description.tchinese: 獲得道具“告別信”

description.brazilian: Obtenha 10 de cada item da casa assombrada. Mesmo que sejam completamente inúteis.
description.english: Obtain 10 of each haunted house item. Even though they are completely useless
description.french: Récupérez 10 objets de chaque sorte dans la maison hantée. Même s'ils ne servent à rien.
description.german: Erhalte 10 aller Spukhaus Item. Auch wenn sie nutzlos sind.
description.italian: Ottieni 10 unità di ciascun oggetto nella Casa Infestata. Anche se non servono a niente.
description.japanese: お化け屋敷のアイテムを10個ずつ手に入れる。全く役に立たないのに。
description.russian: Возьмите 10 предметов из дома с привидениями. Даже если они бесполезны
description.schinese: 把鬼屋里的道具每种囤积10个。虽然这些东西完全没用
description.tchinese: 把鬼屋裏的道具每種囤積10個。雖然這些東西完全沒用

description.brazilian: Aguente 2 minutos de viagem contínua no buggy do deserto.
description.english: Endure 2 minutes of continuous travel time on the dune buggy
description.french: Supportez 2 minutes de voyage ininterrompu dans le buggy des sables.
description.german: Halte zwei Minuten auf dem Dühnenbus aus.
description.italian: Accumula 2 minuti di viaggio ininterrotto sulla dune buggy
description.japanese: 砂丘バギーで2分間の連続移動に耐える
description.russian: Выдержите 2 минуты непрерывного путешествия на багги
description.schinese: 连续忍耐2分钟沙丘越野车的驾驶体验
description.tchinese: 連續忍耐2分鐘沙丘越野車的駕駛體驗

description.brazilian: Encontre todos os bugs relacionados ao pergaminho de introdução.
description.english: Find all bugs related to the intro scroll
description.french: Trouvez tous les bugs liés au parchemin d'introduction.
description.german: Finde alle Bugs in Verbindung zur Intro-Schriftrolle.
description.italian: Trova tutti i bug relativi alla pergamena introduttiva
description.japanese: イントロの巻物に関連するバグを全て見つける
description.russian: Найдите все ошибки, связанные со вступлением-свитком
description.schinese: 找到与开场卷轴相关的全部Bug
description.tchinese: 找到與開場卷軸相關的全部Bug

description.brazilian: Habilite a audiência e então lave-a fora no Reino das Cartas.
description.english: Enable the audience then wash it away in the Card Realm
description.french: Activez le public, puis lavez-le à grandes eaux.
description.german: Aktiviere das Publikum, um es dann im Kartenreich wegzuspülen.
description.italian: Abilità il pubblico e poi lavalo via nel Reame delle Carte
description.japanese: カード王国で観客を洗い流さず有効化する
description.russian: Включите зрителей, а не смывайте их в карточном мире
description.schinese: 在打牌界激活观众，然后把人冲走
description.tchinese: 在打牌界啟動觀眾，然後把人沖走

description.brazilian: Retorne até o Boss Final depois de ser revivido pelo anjo em Bigodeburgo.
description.english: Return to the End Game Boss after having been resurrected by the angel in Whiskerburg
description.french: Retournez voir le Boss de Fin après avoir été ressuscité par l'ange à Stachebourg.
description.german: Kehre zum Endgame Boss zurück, nachdem du vom Engel in Whiskerburg wiederbelebt wurdest.
description.italian: Ritorna dell'End Game Boss dopo essere stato resuscitato dall'angioletto in Baffoburgo
description.japanese: ウィスカーバーグで天使に復活させられ、最終ボスに戻る
description.russian: Вернитесь к финальному боссу после воскрешения ангелом в Вискербурге
description.schinese: 在小胡子屯关卡中被天使复活之后再次挑战终局波士
description.tchinese: 在小鬍子屯關卡中被天使復活之後再次挑戰終局波士

description.brazilian: Consiga a pontuação perfeita no minigame Dance Dance DEVolution.
description.english: Obtain a perfect score in the Dance Dance DEVolution minigame
description.french: Obtenez un score parfait dans le mini-jeu de Dance Dance DEVolution.
description.german: Erlange die volle Punktzahl beim Dance Dance DEVolution Minigame.
description.italian: Ottieni un risultato perfetto nel minigioco Dance Dance DEVolution
description.japanese: ダンスダンスデボリューションのミニゲームで満点を取る
description.russian: Получите высший балл в мини-игре Dance Dance DEVolution
description.schinese: 在尬舞革命迷你游戏中获得完美评分
description.tchinese: 在尬舞革命迷你遊戲中獲得完美評分

description.brazilian: Delete as pastas pessoais do Dev em Erro 101.
description.english: Delete the Dev's personal folders in Error 101
description.french: Supprimez les dossiers persos du Dév dans Erreur 101.
description.german: Lösche den Privatordner des Entwicklers in Fehler 101.
description.italian: Cancella le cartelle personali dello Sviluppatore in Error 101
description.japanese: エラー101で開発者の個人フォルダを削除する
description.russian: Удалите личные папки разработчика при ошибке 101
description.schinese: 在错误101关卡中删除开发者的个人文件夹
description.tchinese: 在錯誤101關卡中刪除開發者的個人檔夾

description.brazilian: Complete a seção de tiro do Final Verdadeiro sem tomar um Game Over.
description.english: Complete the True Ending's shooter section without a Game Over
description.french: Terminez la phase de tir de la Vraie Fin sans obtenir de Game Over.
description.german: Beende den Shooter-Abschnitt des richtigen Endes ohne Game Over.
description.italian: Completa la sezione shooter del Finale Segreto senza fare Game Over
description.japanese: トゥルーエンドのシューティングエリアをゲームオーバーなしでクリアする
description.russian: Завершите часть шутера правильной концовки без проигрыша
description.schinese: 在没有Game Over的情况下通关真结局的射击游戏
description.tchinese: 在沒有Game Over的情況下通關真結局的射擊遊戲

description.brazilian: Ataque o mercador em bigodeburgo.
description.english: Attack the merchant in whiskerburg
description.french: Attaquez le marchand à Stachebourg.
description.german: Greife den Händler in Whiskerburg an.
description.italian: Attacca il mercante a Baffoburgo
description.japanese: ウィスカーバーグの商人を襲う
description.russian: Нападите на торговца в Вискербурге
description.schinese: 攻击小胡子屯的商人
description.tchinese: 攻擊小鬍子屯的商人

description.brazilian: Consiga todas as conquistas.
description.english: Collect all achievements
description.french: Obtenez tous les succès.
description.german: Sammle alle Achievements.
description.italian: Colleziona tutti gli achievement
description.japanese: 実績を全て集める
description.russian: Соберите все достижения
description.schinese: 获得所有成就
description.tchinese: 獲得所有成就
